CustomField.description: NICC-023836: Variance between total contract and milestone rollup amount. This value should be zero. If it's not, please contact the PM or PO to correct PSA milestone(s)
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Variance between total contract and milestone rollup amount. This value should be zero. If it's not, please contact the PM or PO to correct PSA milestone(s)
CustomField.label: Milestone Variance
